title: Inside the August NBC News Poll: Democrats have caught up to Republicans on election interest
description: Mark Murray, senior political editor at NBC News and co-author of First Read, joins Chuck to look into the latest numbers from the NBC News poll.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
